channel.title: How do I make myself an admin and
channel.description:
How do I make myself and admin on PhoneScape? Also how do I make my server available for other people to go on it?
Thanks
-Bridge-

item.title: How do I make myself an admin and
item.dc:creator: @Puremaster Puremaster
item.description:
@Puremaster wrote:

and if u want to be spy admin/owner u can change it to 4 or 5
u will have same power u can do anything but no one sees ur crown.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make myself an admin and
item.dc:creator: @hig_golem hig golem
item.description:
@hig_golem wrote:

Go on your server with any name and pass. And log out. Go to characters in your file from phonescape and search for your name and open it. You will see rights change it into 3 and your owner, change it into 2 for admin, change it into 1 for mod, 0 is normal player.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 09:40:27 AM[/size][hr]If you want to make yourself member go to characters and change ismember to 1 and your member on some servers you need to make yourself member with opening a map lnamed members typ your name in it and your member like figmentscape. If you change ismember to 1 in figmentscape it says you need to be a member to wear this item.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make myself an admin and

item.title: How do I make myself an admin and
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

go to character files and click on your screen name if not there go on a client and click run.bat on your source and for ip type 127.0.0.1 and ull be on your source and your character file is created plus go to to the character files and click on your name and find player rights=0 and change the 0 to a 3 so it means owner. you must be log out to do this and i dunno how to make it available its not free
you need a linksys router and need to port forward to do it its risky cuz it can screw up ur router.

Read full topic
